U

UpdateTracker - Class in dev.rusthero.versionchecker.tasks
A task that checks for updates using a version checker and notifies a consumer when a new version is available or an exception occurs.

V

Version - Class in dev.rusthero.versionchecker
A class representing a version of a software product, which is typically represented as a string.

Constructs a new instance of the Version class with a version string argument.
VersionChecker - Interface in dev.rusthero.versionchecker
A generic interface for version checkers, which can be used to check whether the latest version of a software is being used or not.
